• Drafts

Mighty Learning

Worked with a client on an early stage product that allowed professionals (i.e. college professors, physicians, etc) with little visual design experience to create courses or share conference materials.
The goal was to enable users to create a slick interface that contains different kinds of content in a short amount of time.

Example wireframes

Explorations for flow and arrangement of dashboard and content page.

Explored selecting different layouts to display content while creating a playlist.

Explored adding courses to the content page from the library of user content.
